name: Super Hot Wings! 超級火燒機翅！
name_original: Super Hot Wings! 超級火燒機翅！
description:
Important note: This is a work in progress, so there may be some issues with the balancing. I'd love to hear your feedback on the game!

Super Hot Wings is a fast-paced 2D shooter. Try to outlive your enemies while performing flashy stunts! The game's main feature is slow-motion (as suggested by the title). You will enter slow-motion whenever you release the mouse button, letting you make precise and skilled plays. While in slow motion, you are also able to activate the special move that the plane has equipped, making narrow escapes look incredibly cool.

You can also change the settings of the physics engine to experiment with different balance combinations, or just to break the game entirely. Once you're happy with the balance you've made, or the game you've destroyed, you can share that setting with others by pressing the copy button to copy the settings, then pasting it as a comment. Others can then copy that string of text and paste it into the load function to see your unique set of settings. 

注意：這是半成品，可能有一些不平衡。歡迎和我分享你的意見！

超級火燒機翅是一個高速的2D射擊遊戲。表演特技的同時摧毀敵人飛機！這個遊戲的主要功能是慢動作。在滑鼠放開時遊戲就會進入慢動作，讓你展現出精準的操控技術。除此之外，慢動作時可以使用技能，讓驚險的閃躲變的非常酷！

你還能改變遊戲的物理設定，藉此功能你能夠自己調整平衡，或是故意將遊戲的物理引擎炸掉。當你調整出一個滿意的設定之後，你可以將自己的設定和別人分享。只要按下複製，再到留言區貼上自己的設定，其他玩家只要將字串複製再貼上到遊戲裡的輸入，就可以看見你做出的設定！
